casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Montrez Benjamin WILLIAMS 233P12-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2018 Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Williams, Montrez Benjamin.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of October 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of October 2018."
